author: ryanleeschneider
content: RE: Sepolia/Ropsten beacon chain agenda, will those new beacon chains be launched "soon" as Altair and then forked to Bellatrix w/ a TTD once everyone is ready, or will they be like Kiln and launch w/ a TTD already defined?

author: timbeiko
content: Probably the later. Goerli/Prater will definitely need to go through a proper Bellatrix-only fork. Do you have a preference on either way <@388751025789468672> ?

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Its a tough call, on the one hand I'd like to start syncing the beacon chains ASAP and running them alongside our ELs just to catch any potential gotcha early, but that then requires either the TTD to be decided on early or some coordination closer to when we want to actually merge to either change the TTD or go from Altair to Bellatrix.

author: ryanleeschneider
content: On the other hand kiln has let us test most of that, so maybe it's not as necessary as I think it is.
